name: GLAMM’D - Fashion & Community
description:
Do you have what it takes to conquer the world of fashion? Travel the world, style outfits, do makeovers, win dress up competitions and become the hottest fashion influencer. Show off your style!

MODEL CUSTOMIZATION
Choose your skin tone, hairstyle, outfit and start your fashion adventure! Become the makeover and fashion queen! Make bold style choices & have the winning look!

MAKEOVER TIME
Mix and match tons of stylish clothes and design the perfect look for your fashion model. Dress up in dozens of outfits, accessories and hairstyles. Choose makeup - lipsticks, eyeliners, eyeshadows! There are tons of styles: from hipster to boujee, from casual to luxurious, from sporty to high fashion.

NEW CLOTHES & STYLES
New arrivals! Even more trendy clothes, super stylish hairstyles, fashion accessories and cool tattoos!

DRESS UP COMPETITIONS
The fashion world is full of possibilities! Travel the globe and participate in fashion makeovers and competitions. Make a beach in Miami your swimwear fashion runway. Dress up for a Fashion Week in Paris. Win new outfits & accessories!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play the fashion world of Glamm'd with friends! Befriend other players and chat about everything fashion. Challenge them in competitions! Check Glamm’d social media channels for even more fashion trends and inspiration!

Step up your fashion game with GLAMM’D! Style outfits, win new dress up items and compete with fashion lovers just like you. Make your fashion dreams come true.

Follow GLAMM’D on:
Instagram - @glammdgame
Facebook - @GlammdGame
Pinterest - @GLAMMDGAME

sugarfree is a brand new casual & lifestyle game studio creating apps with simple yet addictive gameplay and extra juicy graphics. sugarfree — your daily healthy dose of gaming!
